author: Trey Alston
title: BTS, The 1975, Charli XCX, And More Will Pack Twitch Stream Aid’s Epic Fundraiser
description: Artists like BTS, The 1975, Charli XCX, and more will be live on Twitch all day Saturday (March 28) for Twitch Stream Aid, a 12-hour fundraiser set to benefit the World Health Organization.
content:
In the past few weeks, artists have taken to different social platforms for livestreamed performances, candid Q&As, and intimate talk-show chats, letting fans into their worlds during a time of uncertainty. This weekend, everything levels up.
On Saturday… [+1489 chars]
